all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Be patient in afflictions, revile not against those that revile. Govern your house in meekness, and be steadfast.
Doctrine and Covenants 31:9
Quote of the Day
"As we keep our temple covenants, we gain greater access to the Lord’s strengthening power."
Russell M. Nelson | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
